abstract: Houston Texans defensive lineman Brandon Ivory is arrested in connection with residential burglary in Tuscaloosa, Ala; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Houston Texans defensive lineman Brandon Ivory was charged in what the police described as a residential burglary in Tuscaloosa, Ala.

headline.main: Texans Lineman Brandon Ivory Charged in Burglary

snippet: Houston Texans defensive lineman Brandon Ivory was charged in what the police described as a residential burglary in Tuscaloosa, Ala.
